channel.description: Recent content in Product Management on Rohan Chadha

item.title: How would you improve Gmail?
item.description:
I keep seeing a lot of Product Improvement cases on Exponent & Product Management Exercises

I was organizing my already booked travel tickets into a folder to make it accessible later. As part of that, I had to search my gmail for emails from MakeMyTrip, Scoot Airlines, Booking, SmartBuy. The whole process such a mess.

I even tried gemini widget inside gmail for the same but it didn’t turnout that good.

Here’s how I would do it
